weekly_top5.name: EchoStar Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Momentum fails if price loses short-term trend support (falls back below rising MAs) and analyst/catalyst narrative fades; also if broader satellite/space complex risk-off resumes.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst price target raise / spectrum-deal narrative extension
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple Citi notes/coverage items in the last week can drive incremental institutional flows and media attention; the SpaceX valuation/spectrum-deal framing can act as a near-term narrative catalyst for another leg higher if the stock holds near highs.

sources.title: Citi Raises PT on EchoStar (SATS) stock
EchoStar price target raised to $111 from $87 at Citi

risk_factors: Narrative-driven moves can reverse quickly if 'SpaceX IPO talk' / spectrum framing cools.
Lower recent volume vs 20D (0.38x) suggests breakout follow-through may be less reliable without renewed participation.

weekly_top5.name: Intuitive Machines, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Setup weakens if the stock gives back the post-upgrade move and closes below short-term moving averages; also if the 'lunar missions acceleration' narrative fails to produce follow-on contract/newsflow.

primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Fresh bullish coverage and a large PT hike can trigger momentum continuation in high-beta space names, especially with elevated realized volatility and recent newsflow around government acceleration of lunar missions.

risk_factors: High-beta/space sector correlation; broad risk-off can overwhelm single-name catalysts.
